name: House of a Thousand Hallways
description:
A game made for the GUDEV Game Jam 8.

Use the A and D keys to dodge obstacles, and see how far you can get!

No matter how far you get, the exit is always too far away...

Credits:

  • Coding :
    • Jonathan Sprague
    • Tom Whitehouse
  • Sound:
    • Daniel Butler
  • Art:

    • Kaspar Ambuehl
